remarks: The covers relation for a left vector space (or a left module). (Contributed by NM, 7-Jan-2015.)
statement:
lcvfbr.s $e |- S = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
lcvfbr.c $e |- C = ( <oL ` W ) $.
lcvfbr.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. X ) $.
lcvfbr $p |- ( ph -> C = { <. t , u >. | ( ( t e. S /\ u e. S ) /\ ( t C. u /\ -. E. s e. S ( t C. s /\ s C. u ) ) ) } ) $.
$d S s t u $.
$d W s t u $.
